bill.summary:
Quadrennial Energy Review Act of 2017
This bill directs the President to establish once every four years a Quadrennial Energy Review Task Force to conduct and coordinate the Quadrennial Energy Review. The Secretary of Energy shall serve as the chairperson of the task force.
Each review must (1) provide an integrated view of important national energy objectives and federal energy policy; and (2) identify the maximum practicable alignment of programs, incentives, regulations, and partnerships.
